name: Milan - Food Tour
description: Savor the flavors of Italy on a 3-hour walking tour of Milan, led by a food-loving local guide! Sample Milan’s legendary dishes while learning the history of the city. You will be wandering the atmospheric streets of Milan with a local guide that will tell you about Italian cuisine and tradition. Italian Pizza and Gelato are among the several mouthwatering bites you get to try along the way. Explore the colorful history of Milan as you tour, accompanied by our expert guide that will wisely mix history and food, culture and fun.
